definition: anniversary of the founding of a school

sentences.english: He says she even volunteered to help prepare for the school festival.
sentences.chinese: 他说她甚至自愿帮忙筹备校庆活动。

sentences.english: Mr. Chan is also an advisor on the HKBU 50th Anniversary Committee.
sentences.chinese: 他亦是浸大五十周年校庆筹委会顾问。

sentences.english: It is truly an honor to be here, and I congratulate you on celebrating your 70th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 很是侥幸来到这里，并祝贺你们70周年校庆。

sentences.english: Do you have a Sports Day at your school?
sentences.chinese: 你们学校举办校庆日吗？

sentences.english: Her birthday is September 15th Do you have a School Day?
sentences.chinese: 她的生日是九月十五号你们有校庆日吗？

sentences.english: I think that we could also produce some merchandise for the centenary.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们可以为百年校庆做一些东西。

sentences.english: Regarding a school, the school anniversary is one quite grand holiday.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个学校来说，校庆是一个相当隆重的节日。

definition: attached (or affiliated) secondary (or middle) school/abbr. for 附屬中學|附属中学[fu4 shu3 zhong1 xue2]
(formal) birthday/anniversary of the founding of an organization
abbr. for 師範大學|师范大学[shi1 fan4 da4 xue2], normal university/teacher training college
